modName: How to make Alva a follower and marry her no ESP
summary: Take Alva as your vampiric follower with advices how to do that not using a mod so sparing one esp in your load order. Advising how to marry her.
descriptionHtml:
[font=Courier New, monospace]Since the start of Skyrim in November 11 of 2011 I was fascinated by Alva, a vampiric NPC living in Morthal.[/font][font=Courier New, monospace]There are some mods which allow you to take her or an identic sister as a follwer, but as she is involved in a quest, nobody was wanting to really care much about her. Also there are really hundreds of mods witch bring super beautiful followers into the game and I really apreciate the work of their creators. The only thing is, you can not install all these wonderful Follower-Mods at the same time, due to limitations of the game itself. So the question everybody has to ask himself is which mod do I really need and how many followers can I install. [/font][font=Courier New, monospace]Taking Alva as a follower can be done via console and does not need any esp. The interested reader can follow my lines, if not, you still may [/font][font=Courier New, monospace]learn some things you maybe did not know.
[/font][font=Courier New, monospace][color=#ff7700][size=2]1. Need to be done before recruiting Alva[/size][/color]
[/font][font=Courier New, monospace]First you need to complete the quest „Laid to Rest“ until stage 100, this is after you killed Movarth, the Master Vampire. I suggest to wait until you have at least Level 8, Movarth is very strong. When he is dead, be sure to clear Movarth´s Lair from hostile NPCs, Alva always stays in that part where the bedrolls are, sometimes she even
is sleeping there. Don´t forget to save your game before handling Alva.
[/font][font=Courier New, monospace][u][b]
[color=#ff7700]2.Converting Alva from hostile to your follower[/color]
[/b][/u][/font][font=Courier New, monospace]This will be done via console: [/font][font=Courier New, monospace]Sneak behind Alva and when she is in your crosshair open console and type
the following commands, by typing

[/font][font=Courier New, monospace][color=#ffff00]StopCombat
[/color][/font][color=#ffff00][font=Courier New, monospace]RemoveFromAllFactions
[/font][font=Courier New, monospace]SetRelationShipRankPlayer 3
[/font][font=Courier New, monospace]AddToFaction0005A1A4 4
[/font][font=Courier New, monospace]AddToFaction0005C84D 4
[/font][/color][font=Courier New, monospace][color=#ffff00]SetPlayerTeamMate 1
[/color]
If you put enemymine.txt into the main folder of Skyrim you can spare typing all that, open console and type 

[color=#ffff00]bat enemymine[/color]

[/font][font=Courier New, monospace]As Alva was hostile to you she might attack you if you fail sneaking behind her.
So you can kill and resurrect her after typing the above lines. [/font][font=Courier New, monospace]Open console, tick Alvas dead body and type:

[color=#ffff00]resurrect[/color]
[/font][font=Courier New, monospace]
Now Alva is friendly to you and you can take her as follower and even go with her to Jarl Ravencrone to reward for Movarth´s death. The Jarl and Alva will ignore each other.
[/font][font=Courier New, monospace][u]
[b][color=#ff7700]3.Cancel limitation of Alva´s Leveling[/color][/b]
[/u][/font][font=Courier New, monospace]Bethesda made a limitation to Alvas Level by 16, this means, by normal way she always would stay at level 16. I do not know why they did that, but as your follower this has to be changed:
[/font][font=Courier New, monospace]Openconsole and type:

[/font][font=Courier New, monospace][b][color=#ffff00]setlevel 1000,0,1,99 [/color]
[/b][/font][font=Courier New, monospace]
Now she will level together with you until 99, if you want more just change the value of 99.

[/font][font=Courier New, monospace][b][color=#ff7700]4.Essential and fine tuning of Alva´s appearance.[/color][/b]
[/font][font=Courier New, monospace]Install Dames of Skyrim which gives you a comletely new looking and very attractive Alva.
[/font][font=Courier New, monospace]Install The Manipulator (google it) to be able to change Alva via RaceMenu. [/font][font=Courier New, monospace]There may be other possibilities, but I use The Manipulator from Lo*ers La*
I don´t know if it is allowed on Nexus to link that. [/font][font=Courier New, monospace]Under People and targeting Alva in Crosshair you find an option "Racemenu Cosmetics". Here you can change many things on NPCs, but do not touch weight or height, this may end up in an ugly neck-gap or grey face. Be careful handling with other settings in the Manipulator, if you do
it´s on your own risk. Tick Alva as Essential and Marriable. If you don´t want to resurrect her or load savegame, too often because she is rather weak at the beginning. In the Racemenu Cosmetics of Manipulator you can add tatoos, if mods are installed, change appearance of breasts, thighs, belly and much more, try it out. [/font][font=Courier New, monospace]Of course RaceMenu must be installed also and Bodyslide with build morphs option done. [/font][font=Courier New, monospace]Alva is now your follower and as conjurer she needs to have 2 more defensive spells, Ward and Stone or Iron Flesh.

[/font][color=#000000][font=Courier New, monospace][color=#ff6600][u][b]5.Giving Spells to Alva[/b][/u][/color]
[/font][/color][font=Courier New, monospace]Using Extensive Follower Framework (EFF) makes it easy to teach Alva some new spells. Of corse you can overpower her with heavy destruction but I personally gave her only three spells, a Ward, Stoneflesch and a
light long ranged destruction spell in case she needs to fight against flying dragons. Best ice or chain lightning. 
[/font][font=Courier New, monospace]
Important and not to forget:
[/font][color=#ff6600][font=Courier New, monospace][u][b]6.As Vampire Alva needs Fire Resistances.
[/b][/u][/font][/color][font=Courier New, monospace]Level your Enchantment Skill permanently and enchant her armor and whatever you give her with sufficient Fire Resistance. When your enchantment skills improve change her armor with new enchanted one.

[/font][color=#ff6600][font=Courier New, monospace][b]7.Enhance Immersion with Fun Mods
[/b][/font][/color][font=Courier New, monospace]My favorite Mod to play Alva with is Bloodthirst – Vampire NPCs can feed.
[/font][font=Courier New, monospace]Not only Alva, but also every Vampire NPC including Serana having the keyword Vampire and Morality 0 will feed on other NPCs including the Player. [/font][font=Courier New, monospace]After installing that you need to check if Alva has morality 0 by opening
the console and ticking Alva, type

[color=#ffff00]getav morality[/color]

If it is 1 or higher, change it in the console by typing

[/font][font=Courier New, monospace][color=#ffff00]setav morality 0[/color]

[/font][font=Courier New, monospace]Especially EFF tends to change the morality of NPCs to 3 the first time you hire them, so change it and EFF will let it untouched in future.

[/font][font=Courier New, monospace][b][u][color=#ff7700]8.Giving armor and weapons[/color][/u][/b]
[/font][font=Courier New, monospace]This is up to you what you give her, but don´t forget to enchant with resistance of fire and lightning. Cold is not so important as a Nord Alva has natural resistance. [/font][font=Courier New, monospace]But consider she is Conjurer and heavy armor is not pleasing her, although she will put it on if you take her wench dress away. [/font][font=Courier New, monospace]If you don´t give her a weapon or teach spells she will mostly use her vampiric drain spell and conjure dead bodies, sometimes a deer or
bunny, sometimes a gargoyl or astonishing strong dead bodies lying around.

[/font][color=#ff6600][font=Courier New, monospace][u][b]9.Considering HDT and the oh so feared invisibility bug.
[/b][/u][/font][/color][font=Courier New, monospace]Alva has her natural spell „Invisibility Vampiric“ and it is not always a bug when you don´t see her. But using HDT and having too many HDT bodies or animations installed can cause NPCs to turn invisible. I found a trick, not to avoid but to make them visible again. The common way is to disable/enable via console, but much
easier it is to use the Spell „Leader´s Teleportation“ from [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12933/?]EFF[/url]. Doesn´t matter if the invisble follower is right beside you, the spell brings her back to visiblity in most of the cases. Of corse highly recommended also the HDT I[/font][font=Courier New, monospace]nvisibility Bug fix Mod which helps a lot.

[b][u][color=#ff7700]10[/color][/u][/b][/font][font=Courier New, monospace][b][u][color=#ff7700].Do you want to marry Alva?
[/color][/u][/b]Here is the way: [/font][font=Courier New, monospace]Alva is not intended by BETHESDA to marry but it is possible: [/font][font=Courier New, monospace]Put on the Amulet of Mara and go questing with Alva for at least 2 ingame days. Always keep the Amulet on your neck for these days, never take
it off. At the third day take Alva to Marmal, the priest in Rifton. Now speak to Alva and – what surprise, you can ask her to marry you. Speak to Marmal and ask him to prepare the wedding. The next day you go to the wedding in the temple of Mara. Now read careful because this is important: When Marmal declares you as pair, speak to
Alva but [b][color=#ff00ff]do not – and do not[/color][/b] touch the dialogue for selecting where to live. Hire her again if she is not your follower any more and take her to your house where you want to live with her. Arrived there talk to her and select dialogue „I need to talk to you“ or similar. Tell her now that you want to stay with her in this house. Now Alva
is your wife. She generates money and cooks for you, just as any other merriable follower. By the way, exactly the same way Serana can be married, if you prefere that. Of course the Amulet of Mara can be taken off now.

[/font][font=Courier New, monospace][color=#ff7700][b][u]11.Recommended mods for more fun with Alva[/u][/b][/color]
[url=http://www.mediafire.com/file/4zc68botnz2z6ix/HdtInvisibilityFix_0_11_beta-77815-0-11beta.7z]HDT Invisibility Bugfix[/url]
[/font][font=Courier New, monospace][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13457/?]FaceLight[/url]
[/font][font=Courier New, monospace][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12933/?]EFF[/url]
[/font][font=Courier New, monospace][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29624/?]Race Menu[/url]
[/font][font=Courier New, monospace][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49038/?]Bloodthirst[/url]
[/font][font=Courier New, monospace]The Manipulator (google it and be be careful)
[/font][font=Courier New, monospace][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/16531/?]Better Stealth AI for followers[/url]
[/font][font=Courier New, monospace][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/78982/?]Follower Potions[/url]
[/font][font=Courier New, monospace][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/57376/?]Multible Floors Sandboxing[/url]
[/font][font=Courier New, monospace][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30533/?]Face to Face Conversation[/url]
[/font][font=Courier New, monospace][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52019/?]Follower Commentary Overhaul[/url]
[/font][font=Courier New, monospace][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2947/?]Deadly Spell Impacts[/url]
[/font][font=Courier New, monospace][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/73473/?]Quick Light[/url]
[/font][font=Courier New, monospace][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49979/?]Rutha Tatoo Pack for Racemenu[/url]
[/font][font=Courier New, monospace][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/80479/?]Dames of Skyrim[/url]
[/font][font=Courier New, monospace][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/79123/?]Get Over Here[/url]
[/font][font=Courier New, monospace][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/11609/?]Follower Trap Safety[/url][/font]

[font=Courier New, monospace][b][u][color=#ff7700]11.Final Lines[/color][/u][/b]
[/font][font=Courier New, monospace]Sorry if there are mistakes in English writing or grammar. English is not my first language, but I think I manage quite well.[/font][font=Courier New, monospace]Skyrim is a very compact game. I startet it about 50 times with a new game, and every time it was different. The above ways worked for me [/font][font=Courier New, monospace]which does not mean they must work every time in every case.
Have fun with Lovely Alva, The Blood Angel [/font]
author: Nitribit
